title: Logging into chat service... [CRASH]
body: Since a few days I have got the error of 'logging onto chat service...' which means that when I want to play, it is not possible to communicate prior to playing. I would like to have this fixed please :).

replies.body:
This is an issue we're currently looking into!  Some players have been unable to connect to chat, but I don't currently have more information or an eta on this.  Hang tight! 

Also, let me know if your client is actually crashing because that could be a different issue entirely!
It said like yesterday or 2 days ago that chat service was down (the official bug report), but after that they did fix it (for me at least) but since today the chat isn't working again.
